feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: Matt Corallo has announced on GitHub that Wallet Encryption is in a pull-able state after a lot of good discussions and a tiny bit of results. He asks for final comments/ACKs. The message includes a link to the GitHub pull request where the encryption feature can be found.
